judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Mandarino, JJ.
Mr. Justice Nix toot no part in the consideration or decision of this case.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Cnbiam,
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
Mr. Justice Nix toot no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Pee Cnbiam,

attorneys: John W. Packet, Assistant Defender, with him Vmcent J. Ziccardi, Defender, for appellant.

Bonnie Brigance Leadbetter, Assistant District Attorney, with her David RAchman, Assistant District Attorney, Abraham J. Gafni, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Newsome, Appellant.
Argued April 25, 1974.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Mandarino, JJ.
John W. Packet, Assistant Defender, with him Vmcent J. Ziccardi, Defender, for appellant.
Bonnie Brigance Leadbetter, Assistant District Attorney, with her David RAchman, Assistant District Attorney, Abraham J. Gafni, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
October 16, 1974:
